title: Paul Israel
text:
Paul Israel (born 23 April 1969) is an Australian former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played for the <a href="South%20Sydney%20Rabbitohs">South Sydney Rabbitohs</a> in the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">New South Wales Rugby League</a> competition in Australia, his position of choice was as a <a href="Rugby%20league%20positions">Lock-forward</a>.
Background.
Israel was born in <a href="Sydney%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Sydney, New South Wales</a>, Australia.
